author: kolbyml
content: Clients are free to choose their n and k. Currently Trin uses k is all the nodes interested in the content in our routing table, n = 8. Where 4 of n are ``1. Closest `NUM_CLOSEST_NODES` ENRs are selected`` and 4 of n are ``2. Random `NUM_FARTHER_NODES` ENRs are selected from the rest``
